item.title: Tried Testkube Today
item.description: Hope you all are having a good day. I tried an very interesting testing tool today. Testkube. what should I call it? ðŸ˜„ Hmm… A testing orcherstrator which runs in k8s. Yes thats what it is. A centralised place where all your exisiting testing tool meets. Bringing all testing tools to one place brings more visibilty and All the test runs on k8s so no usual CI/CD dependencies. What I loved was the setup.
